thumb.title: 無意味な世界の、外れたネジたち Loose Screws in a Senseless World
thumb.description: Depression suck..うつ病はつらい…。Script / Movie: NOSUNLIGHT https://linktr.ee/nosunlight141 Music: Amada, Criss Cross https://www.fiverr.com/fadlanamadahttps://www.fiverr.com/crisscrossnoted Vocal: Akiha https://www.fiverr.com/chiasakiha Mix: Madush D https://www.fiverr.com/madushdiwya Illustration: Sunnie https://vgen.co/kyisuni#poetry #poem
